title: How do you play eve
body:
Tank?
AP?
AD?

HOW SOMEONE TELL ME :|

replies.body:
As Evelynn you can gank through river easily, since you can only keep one pink ward for mid lane you can just gank the side that does not have it. For bot lane (assuming you're blue side) you can easily gank through lane since you don't have to worry about minions seeing you hard farming ins't that great on evelynn. 

For build you pretty much want to go full AP. Chilling smite (Runic Echoes) into Rylai then Protobelt works pretty well. For boots its either moby boots or lucidity boots, but maybe sorc shoes if you need extra burst if your team is heavy AP and they build MR.
just watch moon's stream or vods of him playing eve and just copy what he does
hmm all right just early game she seems to hit for so little its hard to gank ;eople with out being toasted

> [{quoted}](name=Captainn Ginyu,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Pyc6NLLc,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-08-26T23:36:03.218+0000)
>
> hmm all right just early game she seems to hit for so little its hard to gank ;eople with out being toasted

She has like no base damage since all of her stuff is so low cd, so she requires items for her to start ramping up in damage, you really have to engage when they've blown escapes and there's a health advantage among your side vs theirs..especially since you don't have cc.
It should be fairly easy tell tell, since she is an assassin with all AP ratios..

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Pyc6NLLc,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-26T23:30:08.379+0000)
>
> It should be fairly easy tell tell, since she is an assassin with all AP ratios..

She has ad ratios too, and her E does physical damage along with attack speed.

But yeah, AP, and lich bane or similar item as a requirement, and Rylais' and Liandry are good choices too since her burst has been pretty much removed since her last rework.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Pyc6NLLc,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-26T23:30:08.379+0000)
>
> It should be fairly easy tell tell, since she is an assassin with all AP ratios..

yea well full ap eve isint working out so

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Pyc6NLLc,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-26T23:30:08.379+0000)
>
> It should be fairly easy tell tell, since she is an assassin with all AP ratios..

Evelynn has AD ratios on her spells except her ultimate.

Anyway if you go ad expect to be a bruiser type.
I recommend getting runic echoes for mana sustain, then go titanic hydra into tank builds.

slam your forehead on q
i would say ap is better because rylols permaslow
